meanings.definition: The state or quality of being numerous.
meanings.sent1: The numerousnesses of stars in the sky is breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: The numerousnesses of books in the library made her feel overwhelmed.
meanings.sent3: The numerousnesses of cookies in the jar tempted him to have just one more.
meanings.sent4: The numerousnesses of flowers in the garden painted a colorful picture.
meanings.sent5: The numerousnesses of students in the classroom filled the space with energy.

meanings.sent1: She was amazed by the numerousnesses of birds flying overhead.
meanings.sent2: The store offered a numerousnesses of options for customers to choose from.
meanings.sent3: The numerousnesses of toys in the store delighted the children.
meanings.sent4: The numerousnesses of leaves falling in autumn created a golden carpet.
meanings.sent5: The numerousnesses of clouds in the sky provided a beautiful backdrop.
